summary: This bill, the Preventing Deep Fake Scams Act, establishes a Task Force on Artificial Intelligence in the Financial Services Sector. The Task Force, led by the Secretary of the Treasury, will assess the risks and benefits of AI in financial services, focusing on consumer protection against fraud and data theft through deep fakes. The Task Force will consult with industry experts, issue a public report including best practices and recommendations for legislative action and regulation within one year of the bill's enactment.
